titles.title: To authorize an additional district judgeship for the district of Nebraska.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committee.name: House Judiciary
committee.subcommittee: Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property

bill.summary:
1/8/2009--Introduced.
Requires the President to appoint, with the advice and consent of the Senate, one additional district judge for the district of Nebraska.
